schema-org:description.@value:
Programmatic access to SMART downtime event

This example is published after import of the currently published Swagger file, effective 13 August 2019.

In this file there was a duplicate 'Get' operationId and the two occurrences were edited to GetAlarmGroups and GetPenalisingStatus respectively.

There are some fundamental deficiencies with the publication of this example:
1. The URI parameters are not described;
2. The 'summary' text is not visible.

raml-http:guiSummary.@value: Get a list of alarms for a single downtime event.

schema-org:description.@value: The downtime event start time
The downtime event start time
The key identifies the SCADA object
The key identifies the SCADA object
Success

raml-http:guiSummary.@value: Get a list of downtime events for a site that overlap with a time period

schema-org:description.@value: The inclusive start of the time period. A date without a time is converted to the start of the day

The exclusive end of the time period. A date without a time is converted to the start of the day
The exclusive end of the time period. A date without a time is converted to the start of the day
The SMART API key of the site
The SMART API key of the site
Success

The SMART API key of the downtime event's SCADA object

The following properties are copied:
AlarmGroup
AlarmDefinition
AvailabilityIndicator
Description
